title: This Is Life with Lisa Ling!
description:
Award-winning journalist Lisa Ling joins us in the studio to discuss the side effects of benzodiazepines, porn addiction, and other topics from the new season of her CNN series, ”This is Life with Lisa Ling.” 


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
